uint32_t upk_packet_t::payload_len

not size_t, because this would force the arch of the client to match the server; and even on localhost, that cannot be guaranteed

Referenced by upk_create_pkt(), upk_queue_packet(), and v0_serialize_payload().

upk_pkttype_t upk_packet_t::pkttype

will be forced into a uint32_t; even on 64bit

Referenced by upk_create_pkt(), and v0_serialize_payload().
